p: Human serum samples from 62 Zika patients were sent to the Center for Virology of the Medical University of Vienna for diagnostic purposes. As negative controls, 32 flavivirus-negative samples from a previous diagnostic study, in which we analyzed TBE antibody responses, were included [ 35]. The samples were tested anonymously with the approval of the ethics committee of the Medical University of Vienna (EK134/2008). No samples were specifically collected for this study.
